mapper.select: SELECT MENU_CD , MENU_NAME , MENU_URL , UPPER_MENU_CD , SORT_ORDR , MENU_GUBN , OUTPT_FG , MENU_CSS , REGP_ID , REG_DTM , MODP_ID , MOD_DTM FROM POLARBEAR.TB_SYSMNUXM START WITH UPPER_MENU_CD IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_CD = UPPER_MENU_CD ORDER SIBLINGS BY SORT_ORDR

SELECT MENU_CD , MENU_NAME , MENU_URL , UPPER_MENU_CD , (SELECT MENU_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_SYSMNUXM WHERE MENU_CD=A.UPPER_MENU_CD) AS UPPER_MENU_NAME , SORT_ORDR , MENU_GUBN , OUTPT_FG , MENU_CSS , REGP_ID , REG_DTM , MODP_ID , MOD_DTM FROM POLARBEAR.TB_SYSMNUXM A WHERE MENU_CD = #{MENU_CD}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POLARBEAR.TB_SYSMNUXM (MENU_CD, MENU_NAME, MENU_URL, UPPER_MENU_CD, SORT_ORDR, MENU_GUBN, OUTPT_FG, MENU_CSS, REGP_ID, REG_DTM, MODP_ID, MOD_DTM) VALUES (#{MENU_CD}, #{MENU_NAME}, #{MENU_URL}, #{UPPER_MENU_CD}, #{SORT_ORDR}, #{MENU_GUBN}, #{OUTPT_FG}, #{MENU_CSS}, #{REGP_ID}, SYSDATE, #{MODP_ID}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE POLARBEAR.TB_SYSMNUXM SET MENU_NAME = #{MENU_NAME}, MENU_URL = #{MENU_URL}, UPPER_MENU_CD = #{UPPER_MENU_CD}, SORT_ORDR = #{SORT_ORDR}, MENU_GUBN = #{MENU_GUBN}, OUTPT_FG = #{OUTPT_FG}, MENU_CSS = #{MENU_CSS}, MODP_ID = #{MODP_ID}, MOD_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE MENU_CD = #{MENU_CD}
